Reviews.Title: Cheap
Reviews.Author: Lonnie E Johnson
Reviews.Content: No magnification, LED screen glitch; nothing works, it is a cheap toy, cheap imitation of the, Vivitar CV1025 10X25 Binocular Digital Camera, which I purchase after I was very disappointed with the cheap imitation; it I like a carnival toy you get out of a 10 cent candy machine. And the price was $29.00 I want to know how do I request a return and refund?  Would very strongly recommend not to purchase this item!lej

Reviews.Title: BYER BEWARE!!  GARBAGE!!
Reviews.Author: Cyndy Lutrell-Moulds
Reviews.Content: This has fake adjustments for the focus.  The camera did not work, even with several changes of batteries.  For the price I expected at least the binoculars would work.  I was so wrong.

Reviews.Title: Premium camera Binoculers
Reviews.Author: Cy
Reviews.Content: came as advertised. Before the promised date. have not used yet bought for a gift seems like they will enjoy it

ProductInfo.Features:
binocular and digital camera in one unique device
2 MB memory storage
Take digital picture at 640 x 480 pixels
captures video and face to face communication over the internet
ProductInfo.Name: TrailWorthy Digital Camera Binoculars
